text: The men's large hill team ski jumping competition for the 1994 Winter Olympics was held in Lysgårdsbakken. It took place on 22 February. ==Results== Each team consisted of four jumpers, with each jumping twice, with all jumps counting towards the final team total. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" !
